data.name: Battle Shooter
data.detailed_description:
This is a First-person shooter game. Unique Modified weapons system to create the player's unique gun, conquer every enemy. The combination of the next generation of gameplay, diversified map and mode selection, leading players to the volatile battlefield, enjoy different game fun. Independently developed engine, ultra-high-quality lead players to experience unprecedented fierce battlefield.

Features

    Free game and fun! Ultra-high-quality multiplayer online first-person gunfight game. There are 8 game modes, 24 battle maps, and hundreds of guns with different modes and gameplay. The ultimate variety makes the game more than just defeating the enemy. Provide players more game pleasure.Create player’s own weapons! There are hundreds of accessories in the game, creating unique weapons based on the player's personal play style and understanding of the game. Let each bullet leave your own name and let the enemy surrender without a fight.Independent game engine, ultra-high quality! The game takes the doomsday city as the battle scene, and restores the battlefield scene and gun equipment truly, so that players can feel immersive when playing the game. Take control of your character and experience the ever-changing battlefield.
  • Game mode introduction:
    There are traditional team, capture the flag, blast, and individual modes, as well as the challenging death and survival modes. Also added are resident Evil themed infection mode and Parasitic mode.

  • Weapons Introduction:
    Players can equip 4 weapons at the same time: primary weapon, secondary weapon, melee weapon, throwing weapon.
    The main weapons are divided into five categories: rifles, sniper rifles, machine guns, shotguns, submachine guns, a total of 61 firearms. The secondary weapon is a pistol, a total of seven firearms; also, there are6 melee weapons and 7types of throwing weapons.

  • Weapons Modification System Modification:
    Players can modify five parts of the gun: muzzle flame color, magazine, scope, barrel accessories, and paint.
    Muzzle effects change the visual effects of shooting, and paint changes the appearance of the gun, which can make your weapon different.
    The magazine increases the load, the sight improves the shooting accuracy, and the barrel accessories increase the shooting auxiliary ray. All three make the player more powerful.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
